title: Huly Core Architecture
body_html:
Huly Core Architecture

Integrated Webhook Data Flow (Diagram)

flowchart LR
  subgraph Huly Core
    TX[TxCUD Events]
    TRG[Webhook Trigger]
    EVT[Create WebhookEvent]
  end

  subgraph Async Processing
    Q[Queue / Scheduler]
    DSV[Delivery Service]
    RETRY{Retry Policy}
    DLQ[Dead Letter]
  end

  subgraph External
    TGT[(Webhook Target)]
  end

  TX --> TRG --> EVT --> Q --> DSV -->|HTTP POST| TGT
  DSV -->|Fail| RETRY
  RETRY -->|Next attempt| DSV
  RETRY -->|Max attempts| DLQ

Notes

  • Transactions (TxCUD) trigger the webhook logic inside Huly
  • WebhookEvent documents are created and scheduled for async delivery
  • Delivery service handles signing, POSTing, retries, and dead-lettering
